website_summaries.verdict: Nestled, porcelain love birds in a simple yet elegant design.
pros: Doubles as a wedding keepsake to display
Suitable for casual or fancier wedding cakes
cons: Birds don’t quite sit flat when necks are intertwined

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous pieces, but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a cake topper for my wedding. They are extremely pretty, however mine will not sit flat on a table when the two birds are linked together, the one that curls around the other was a little bit shorter. Since they will be on a cake this does not really matter as the frosting will help make it a non-issue. However for the price I would have expected a better fit. This will not really matter in the end, but I do have to take off 1 star for it. Overall a great piece and would definitely recommend to anyone looking to add a classy topper to their cake.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THESE SO MUCH! We had a casual wedding, so these were perfect! They are as cute in person, and were the perfect simple topper for our top tier (10"). We had tons of compliments on them and they are now on our mantle. A perfect reminder of our day without having something that looks like a cake topper sitting there. Buy them ... you'll love them!
customer_reviews.author: Kkynmora

customer_reviews.title: Love the birds
customer_reviews.text: I somehow got into the lovebirds theme by accident through planning my wedding. This cake topper stood out to me because of the visual of love/one bird holding onto the other. The cake topper is really nice in size and the material is quite sturdy enough to last over time. I cant wait to put this on top of the wedding cake and have fun with the unique element of lovebirds other than the normal "couple" cake topper.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: My girl loves them!
customer_reviews.text: My fiance was planning on having gum paste roses on our cake until she saw these. She is thrilled with them. They are less expensive than the gum paste roses and we can have them as a keepsake. They will look great on the mantle after the wedding. They are good quality and not too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: CandR

customer_reviews.title: Perfect compliment to the cake
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this lovely set of doves to top my daughter's wedding cake. It came on time and was well packaged. The set was beautiful on the cake she chose. Now it is a lovely addition to her new house as a reminder of their love for each other and their life together. I highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Terry2Fish

customer_reviews.title: Cute topper
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with this at first sight! Amazon had the best price online as far as I could find. I cannot wait to put them on our wedding cake and then on display in our first place. The one with the long neck looks a little awkward by itself, but they aren't meant to be separate pieces! So happy with this purchase, if you're considering buy this, go for it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cake topper for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: This cake topper is a great choice of you're looking for something a little more unique than the typical bride & groom combo. It's a good quality topper for the price and will make a nice memento after the wedding. The material it is made from is not as heavy as regular ceramic, which is a good thing since it has to perch on the top of a cake!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect icing on our cake!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I had a lovebird theme at our wedding. These love birds were the perfect topper to our cake and at a great price. My wife was thrilled when I found them, and I was thrilled they were Primed and hear within 2 days. We're very happy to have made these part of our big day and hope you do too.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: such a sweet topper! I still have them in my curio
customer_reviews.text: such a sweet topper! I still have them in my curio cabinet
customer_reviews.author: LTK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cake topper
customer_reviews.text: This was my wedding cake topper! We loved it! It was the talk of the entire reception! Excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.author: La Fashionista Diva

customer_reviews.title: Great Cake Topper!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my wedding in 09/2009. Just like marriage, the birds look a little "off" when on their own, but perfect when put together. We received many compliments on this topper-- great for any couple who doesn't feel properly represented by the bride & groom ones. Non-religious and non-denominational, what you see is what you get. Please note, however, that the birds CAN come apart... if this will bother you, perhaps you should find another top for your cake. When I (eventually) get a hutch, these birds will go up on display. I hope other "love birds" enjoy this topper as much as I did!
customer_reviews.author: Julia 1984

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and different topper
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with this topper when I saw it online and wasn't let down by it in person - it looked beautiful on the cake and received many compliments for it's uniqueness. Plus, it looks charming on the fireplace mantle (if you didn't know it was a cake topper, you'd never guess).
customer_reviews.author: Polymath

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted, and great value!
customer_reviews.text: These birds are everything I was looking for! They are contemporary and very classy, and I know they will make a beautiful memento from our wedding to have around the house. They will make a beautiful cake-topper, although they might be a little large for some cakes.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel P.

customer_reviews.title: exactly how it is pictured
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use as a wedding cake topper, in the panic dash of the big day, I forgot to take it to my venue and ended up having to put flowers on top of the cake. :( I had opened the box when I got the birds though, and they are exactly as pictured, each one was about the size of my hand, so maybe a little bigger than I was expecting (I was thinking it would be more fist size). It was really light weight though, so would have been a perfect cake topper. Looks well made and classy in person. I would definitely recommend this. Fast shipping and package came in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Kim2345

customer_reviews.title: Great, classic cake topper
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a beautiful cake topper for your sweet and romantic wedding, this one is perfect. The ivory color is perfect for me since I have an ivory dress and my cake icing will be off-white. The sweet birds are relatively light-weight and will fit our classic romantic theme. The two birds fit together nicely as well and will look nice from all sides of the cake. I can't wait to see them on my wedding cake in August!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This cake toppers are amazing. They looked beautiful on our wedding cake. What's even better, they aren't heavy toppers. This makes it so that our cake decorator did not have to reinforce the cake which is cheaper and you get more cake!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: We used these on our wedding cake. One broke and it broke my heart. Came back and bought another set because they meant so much to me. We still have the broken one.
customer_reviews.author: Dody

customer_reviews.title: Great Cake Topper
customer_reviews.text: We loved this item! We were looking for something classy and these looked awesome on our cake! I love the fact that they look great sitting on my dresser now, so that it was an item we can still use and look at to reminisce about the wedding!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect! They are very well made and adorable! I am a Wedding Photographer and I go to Wedding Expo's. These are the perfect little accents I needed for my table.
customer_reviews.author: Cory McKee

customer_reviews.title: so pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Very elegant topper for the Shabby Chic cake I made, so pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Marsha

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cake topper for a Lovebird theme wedding
customer_reviews.text: I loved it since the first time I saw it online. It looks romantic and delicate, excellent as a wedding cake topper. I will use it on my Lovebirds theme wedding this summer.
customer_reviews.author: EnslyG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for displaying after the wedding
customer_reviews.text: These were beautiful on top of my wedding cake and now look just as lovely on my mantle as the perfect reminder of that day. They were the perfect size they didn't over power or get lost in the cake. Since they aren't a bride and groom or "wedding-esque" they look great with my normal home decor and can sit on my mantle forever without looking silly or out of place. Even when the wedding pictures get changed to baby pictures they will still be there.
customer_reviews.author: Mare

customer_reviews.title: So lovely
customer_reviews.text: Looked great as my wedding topper. Nicely made. Would recommend. It's 2 birds that rest on each other. Easy to separate and clean.
customer_reviews.author: RNthatLUVSshoes

customer_reviews.title: Simple, elegant beauty!
customer_reviews.text: We loved how our wedding cake looked with this cake topper. These birds were such a simple and sweet way to top it off, while bringing elegance to the table.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: I loved these toppers
customer_reviews.text: I loved these toppers. They were beautiful on our cake, and now we use them as figurines in our house.
customer_reviews.author: Sheep

customer_reviews.title: Lovely!
customer_reviews.text: I love this topper! The glazed porcelain is beautiful and I can't wait to use these on our cake. Not plastic-y at all, like another reviewer said. The description says that the two birds can be separated to make a centerpiece, one bird has a strangely long neck, meaning the single bird look would not look good.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa L.

customer_reviews.title: States 10lbs but feels like 10 ounces
customer_reviews.text: Lighter then described. States 10lbs but feels like 10 ounces. Not a complaint at all because it will sit well on my wedding cake !!!
customer_reviews.author: Raiyah's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cake topper. Not as ivory as some reviewers say but definitely not white. Used this at my wedding and received lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Ardaisy

customer_reviews.title: Love love love them!
customer_reviews.text: This product is just as adorable in person as shown online. The lovebirds are the perfect size, durable shiny material, not cheap looking at all!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Chmielewski

customer_reviews.title: Excited to use this on my wedding cake!
customer_reviews.text: This arrived nicely packaged, and looked beautiful. I'm so excited to see it on the top of my wedding cake!
customer_reviews.author: AOlsson

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: These came in quickly & looked exactly like their picture. They were a little larger than what I pictured but other than that they look great. I plan to use them on top of my wedding cake next year & will bring them with me to the bakery to make sure they'll fit on top. I would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for something a little bit different - but not too different - cake topper.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: They are made well. They look just like the picture. We like them a lot. These are for our wedding cake.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Bongard

customer_reviews.title: Elegant
customer_reviews.text: I had my wedding in April and I loved my topper. These are so elegant and well done. They are a big step up from the tacky plastic toppers you see everywhere. However because they are NOT plastic they do weigh a bit and you should plan for that when ordering your cake. I thought it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: and they were so pretty i know have them on the fire place
customer_reviews.text: I used them for my wedding cake, and they were so pretty i know have them on the fire place.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina C. Manning

customer_reviews.title: Cute Cake Topper!
customer_reviews.text: These two love birds were the best cake topper I could have picked to represent the love between my husband and I. I didn't want the traditional groom and bride or monograms....this was perfect. My aunt, who also made my cake, added an extra touch by adding a cute veil and a bowtie...even cuter. Now they are a cute keepsake in our home to remember the wonderful night. I highly recommend these love birds.
customer_reviews.author: S & T S.....

customer_reviews.title: Perfect :) Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something that was a little different, and found it! The perfect size and at a VERY reasonable price, I love that our wedding cake topper will be a centerpiece on our table or on a shelf in our new house, and not just in a box somewhere after our wedding. It's so cute and fun and us :) and it came quickly, no problems with shipping or delivery, and was even better than the picture!
customer_reviews.author: metalchik

customer_reviews.title: Perfect !
customer_reviews.text: I just loved my love birds. This product is manufactured in China, so china is not so perfect, with a few wrinkles. But it will work exactly as I planned on my wedding!
customer_reviews.author: Luciana D. Araujo

customer_reviews.title: cake topper
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very quickly, was beautiful on top of our wedding cake, it now sets on the mantel to remind of us of our wedding day.
customer_reviews.author: Miss K

customer_reviews.title: So pretty
customer_reviews.text: The size is great! It was so beautiful on our wedding cake and very elegant. I was very happy with it!!
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: our cake topper
customer_reviews.text: had these at our wedding as a cake topper. We had a peacock themed wedding and our cake was simple. it had peacock colored wafers cascading down and we put the two birds on top.
customer_reviews.author: S. Perez

customer_reviews.title: perfect! So beautiful on top of our wedding cake ...
customer_reviews.text: perfect! So beautiful on top of our wedding cake and made a great time piece for our dining room :)
customer_reviews.author: lauren k

customer_reviews.title: Wedding Cake Topper
customer_reviews.text: I used these birds as the cake topper at my wedding. I was looking for something that was classy and something I could display in my home after the wedding. The birds were lovely and now are displayed in a cabinet in my dining room. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: ash_renee

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: They are beautiful and lightweight. Fit perfectly with our cake. They came a little later than they were expected to arrive.
customer_reviews.author: SQ2000

customer_reviews.title: Even more adorable then I imagined!
customer_reviews.text: I was originally not going to use a cake topper but for the last few months I have been coming back to these hugging birds. OMG, they are adorable. I am getting married in a week and happily recieved them today. The product is perfect and as cute as can be! It was shipped promtly! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My sister and I purchased this cake topper for our parent's 60th anniversary cake. We wanted something simple and elegant and this topper was perfect. They have it as a keepsake they can display in their home.
customer_reviews.author: Owengirl79

customer_reviews.title: Just as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: This was a great topper for our wedding cake. So romantic. We loved it! I would definitely recommend. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Jones

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery, perfect size for my wedding cake and not too heavy. We even painted them to match our wedding colors and they still fit together. Great as decor as well.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: So excited to use these birds for my wedding cake next month! they are perfect size not too small and not too big :)
customer_reviews.author: Mermiesc

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cake topper
customer_reviews.text: This cake topper is beautiful. The price was great and we received it in a very timely manner. We are very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: LKD

customer_reviews.title: love birds
customer_reviews.text: I loved this cake topper. It was bigger than I thought and a lot lighter. Which is good because it was perfect for the top of a cake. I would recommend this to anyone who is thinking about getting it because I think you will fall in love with this item.
customer_reviews.author: pifdog

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: These were as cute in person as they were in the picture. The only minor thing is that both of them do not sit flat. To get them to intertwine perfectly, one of the birds sits at a slight angle. No big deal for me, just an observation.
customer_reviews.author: bride2b

customer_reviews.title: They looked lovely in the picture but once they arrived ...
customer_reviews.text: They looked lovely in the picture but once they arrived they turn out to be way too big for a cake topping :S
customer_reviews.author: Lizbeth Roa

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful topper & the best price I found online! A little bigger than expected- but a nice surprise:) can't wait to use this for our wedding in June!
customer_reviews.author: J3radny

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, just as I expected! Also, great price. I had compared other online sites before purchasing and Amazon.com was cheaper than the others. Arrived quickly, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey R. Braaten

customer_reviews.title: Lovely doves
customer_reviews.text: The topper is a treat. It came perfectly packaged and loved lovely on the engagement cake. I'm excited to have it for the wedding cake.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: Do Not buy from this seller...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item weeks ago and never received it. Nor have I gotten any response from the seller. I will have to file a claim with Amazon..
customer_reviews.author: Tuesday60

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our nature themed wedding
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to place atop our nature themed, stained glass look, 3 tier cake...and it was perfect. The simplicity of the design and white ceramic fit well with our very detailed, and very brightly colored cake. They're so cute and are a perfect expression of love. The pieces are somewhat heavy so make sure to tell your cake decorator so they can add the appropriate support. They're a nice quality of ceramic and do not look or feel cheaply made whatsoever. After the wedding, I kept the love birds to use as part of the decor in our bedroom. They work great for repurposing and keeping a little momento from that day around all year.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and elegant
customer_reviews.text: After I use this for my wedding cake topper, I will repurpose for decor in my garden. Great purchase for topper that you can easily place within everyday decor.
customer_reviews.author: Ernesto Arellano Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Love Birds Wedding Cake Topper
customer_reviews.text: I received this topper for our Wedding Cake and was very pleased with the size and feel of these love birds. The lady making our cake says they will be perfect and she was also very complimentery. I will use them later in a special place in our Living Area as a special reminder of our Wedding Day! I also heard of a couple who had some birds that were entwined somewhat like these and later when they were upset with one another, one of the spouses would turn the bird away from the other and when things got straightened out, they put them back together... just thought that was a unique way of disagreeing!!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela S. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: We wanted something simple and elegant, totally believers in that less is more... but this item is really a lot more than we expected. I was afraid it was going to be too small but it just looks perfect, perfect size, perfect color. Very white and elegant. The material is very delicate so you need to be very carefull otherwise it could break easily...I totally recommend if you like simple elegance and are looking for a love bird themed wedding.
customer_reviews.author: wendyr

customer_reviews.title: Love Birds :)
customer_reviews.text: These came and arrived quickly and well packaged. My fiance and I were looking for something to put on the cake; but we didn't want anything cheap looking. These really have a nice finish; and I'm excited that they are something we can keep and maybe even pass on. A great product for the couple that doesn't want little plastic people on their cake.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly and Steve from CNY

customer_reviews.title: They're even better than the picture!
customer_reviews.text: These lovebirds are so cute! They're even better than the picture - the perfect size and an excellent keepsake for after the wedding. My fiance joked that we should turn them into salt and pepper shakers. I'm very excited to use them for our wedding cake!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Lovely love birds!
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought this love bird cake topper for my wedding cake, and it's even better in person than I imagined! Material is better quality than some reviews led me to believe: no plastic involved. Both pieces are well-made in ceramic and fit together easily. I can't wait to use this on our wedding day and then display the sweet birds in our newlywed nest.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Love my Love Birds!
customer_reviews.text: I am an older bride and, although this isn't my first marriage, I've never had a real wedding. I've been having fun with the planning and finding the little details I want at great prices has been part of the fun. I started looking at used cake toppers because, really, how used are they? I was so excited to find the exact cake topper I wanted at a fraction of the price. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Joy Dart

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love our "Love Birds" on top of our Grooms cake... Perfect for our theme!!! Mrs Byrd
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: loved it, very simple and dainty
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a cake topper for our wedding, loved it, very simple and dainty. Recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: It was super cute on our cake
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cake topper! The birds looked super cute on our cake. Be aware, however, that they are not light. Since they're made of porcelain they're a little heavy. As long as you're not choosing a super light cake like angle food, you should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: TOO ADORABLE, I love whoever designed these!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I were looking for something a little more "us", and these were perfect and absolutely adorable! Come in a box with styrofoam to keep them safe, before and after wedding. Fantastic keepsake too! We put them on our mantle as the centerpiece to our living room, would not have done that with other toppers because that would have been tacky - but we can with these! Will probably pass on as heirlooms because they are simple, sweet, and timeless. May even use for future anniversaries and such. So worth the price (which is cheap anyway!)
customer_reviews.author: Cristelle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Cake topper
customer_reviews.text: This topper is really adorable and fits my theme of love birds to a T. I am really impressed with the quality of the piece and after they find their home on the cake, they will eventually move to a shelf in my house as decoration, I love this piece.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: It is very nice and looked wonderful on our wedding cake
customer_reviews.text: Cake topper was as pictured. It is very nice and looked wonderful on our wedding cake! We still have them displayed on our bookcase and they look pretty and decorative. I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Dru

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: True the longer neck one might look funny alone, but together they are beautiful. I love them and can't wait to use them. I have been really careful with them because I don't want to chip them or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Violet L.

customer_reviews.title: Weddingstar Contemporary Love Birds Cake Topper
customer_reviews.text: I think It would have been pretty heavy for the cake so the recipients placed it in front of the cake and we took a very nice picture.
customer_reviews.author: beddy

customer_reviews.title: Very cute birds
customer_reviews.text: Love these love birds. Looked great on the top of wedding cake, not cheap looking. Good quality item for the price!.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Ahrens

customer_reviews.title: pretty perfect
customer_reviews.text: put on the top of our wedding cake. beautiful first of all. easy to clean off. the packaging it came in really protects it. now i have it sitting on our book shelf. hope they last forever!
customer_reviews.author: Rogue Rose

customer_reviews.title: simple and pretty...
customer_reviews.text: What you see is what you get...very simple, exactly what I wanted for our wedding cake. Even kept them after-cute little keepsake.
customer_reviews.author: leah-

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: a little smaller than I like, but we will used it
customer_reviews.author: boston

customer_reviews.title: good price
customer_reviews.text: I had seen these in many wedding sites and they all were much more expensive than at Amazon, the topper is cute and not that much difference in size. I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.author: zanira

customer_reviews.title: Great wedding cake topper
customer_reviews.text: We brought this cake topper for our wedding cake, and it was the best choice ever. It's delicate looking, but sturdy in construction. I absolutely love our love birds, and they stay on our mantel place at home now.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I had these doves as our cake topper for our wedding. We got so many compliments on them and they are absolutely beautiful. They are unique and heart warming. They now sit where we can see them every day and enjoy them!
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Good

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Sweet Cake Topper
customer_reviews.text: These cute porcelain birds were great as our wedding cake topper. They were well made but light enough for the top of the cake at the same time. Went really well with our garden themed wedding.
customer_reviews.author: S. Nelms

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: Although a little big it came quickly and was a wonder decoration for my folks anniversary cake.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew D. Thames

customer_reviews.title: Lovely!
customer_reviews.text: These doves are so beautifully crafted! They made our wedding cake stunning!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anna L. Delaney

customer_reviews.title: Nice birds. Made in China.
customer_reviews.text: Used these for our cake, very nice looking birds. Heavy, but the cake held. The birds are made in China.
customer_reviews.author: betula

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!!
customer_reviews.text: GORGEOUS!!! They're absolutely perfect!! The price was great, product brand new and shipping was fast!! Extremely happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Cute object but a little pricey
customer_reviews.text: This cake topper is very delicate and beautiful. The finish has good quality but nothing exceptional. The birds fit each other nicely giving the cake a very nice and lovely appearance. Price, however, is a little high for such an object.
customer_reviews.author: João Pedro

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Cake Topper
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this cake topper, it's very elegant and classy. I didn't want the traditional bride and groom, and this was a perfect alternative. This piece will also serve well as a decorative item in my home.
customer_reviews.author: kalamitykay

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: We had this product on our wedding cake and had MANY compliments!!! I would highly recommend this product!! I thought it looked a bit large when I recieved it, but it turned out to be the perfect size for the standard wedding cake!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Forget bride and groom toppers!
customer_reviews.text: These went so well on our wedding cake and look even lovelier, still, in our china cabinet as a momento.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Sutton

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: color was a little darker than picture (ivory) but over all beautiful and matched my love birds wedding theme perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Classy and simple!
customer_reviews.text: The lovebirds looked really lovely on our cake. very simple, lightweight and well packaged. the only thing was that the colour was whiter than I thought, so It did not match the icing perfectly. Otherwise They were perfect!
customer_reviews.author: December bride

customer_reviews.title: Cake topper
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these for her cake topper. They look very nice and elegant. We are anxious to see them on her cake.
customer_reviews.author: jachapman

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: They looked wonderful on our cake! People loved the simplicity of it. Our cake had a bit of detail to it, and the birds didn't take away from the detail...
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: This wedding cake topper is beautiful and fully expresses the tenderness that my fiance and I feel for each other. I love the love birds! It is just like the picture, a good size, and surely something we will keep and cherrish our wedding by.
customer_reviews.author: N Brown

customer_reviews.title: great topper
customer_reviews.text: Very cute wedding cake topper. Just as described. We cant wait to see it on the cake. Very nice for the price.
customer_reviews.author: watergirl39

customer_reviews.title: Sweet, not your run of the mill wedding topper!
customer_reviews.text: These love birds are exactly what my daughter was looking for! Delicate, unusual, elegant, PERFECT! Inexpensive for such a pretty topper. Not too heavy for cake. LOVE IS IN THE AIR!
customer_reviews.author: Kath

customer_reviews.title: Simply Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this cake topper for my wedding cake. It was spectacular. Everyone loved the cake and the topper just completed the elegant look of the whole thing. I plan on setting this in our display case with our china.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but not the Elegant Cake Topper I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: The two doves are more of plastic material, which is cute, but kind of cheapens the look if you have an elegant cake. It'll look great, however, on top of my mantle.
customer_reviews.author: Takeya

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful topper at a great price, I'm thrilled!! Can't wait to see this on top of my wedding cake! Shipped quick and properly packaged for safety.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Ray

customer_reviews.title: Not as expensive looking as I would like.
customer_reviews.text: These birds are okay. Not quite as cool as I expected, nor as expensive looking. They're probably worth around $12. I would probably shop around for a better cake topper, as they're not quite distinct enough, nor modern/cool enough to use on your wedding cake.
customer_reviews.author: KKM

product_meta.title: Weddingstar Contemporary Love Birds Cake Topper
feature_bullets: For the "new Love Birds" These timeless, contemporary snow white birds nestle together, interlocking their necks in an embrace, or use separately in a centerpiece.
Made of glazed porcelain, these are sure to be a lasting keepsake.
A delightful concept that puts a fun spin on the Bride and Groom cake decoration.
Attractive Design, Durable, High Quality, Great Value, Fun, Unique

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
